description:
Dive deep to explore coral-covered ships in the search of invaluable artifacts and exotic treasures.

Enjoy the perfectly polished touch mechanics in over 100 unique match-3 puzzles.Gameplay Variety is guarantied through numerous grid types, careful level balance, 2 game modes, relaхing inlay puzzles, numerous bonuses and power ups!

Watch VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L2bDLY0Sjl8

*Story Mode: progress level by level, discover and restore long-lost treasures, earn numerous achievements and get coin prizes!

*Blitz Mode: you are given 60 seconds as a base, but can extend your game play to several minutes! Work out your own strategy to fight the timer and win over the opponent and collect even more coins!

*Random opponent adds the challenge, but winning over one results in coins prizes!

Powerful Time, Power Up and coin Boosts will charge your game for as long as 5 days!
